roleset.name: spread thickly

example.name: usual use
example.text: The ocean waves brough the oil to shore, making a mess of the beautiful coral coastline and slathering shellfish and aquatic plants.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The ocean waves brought the oil to shore , making a mess of the beautiful coral coastline , slathering shellfish and aquatic plants , and filling the air with a petroleum stench .

example.name: arg1 as core
example.text: Next to her lazed Sophia Pekowsky, a seventh grader from suburban Boston, who-1 *trace*-1 had slathered her face with mashed papaya, a gob of which had slid into her left ear.
example.arg: Sophia Pekowsky, a seventh grader from suburban Boston,
with mashed papaya, a gob of which had slid into her left ear.

roleset.note: SLATHER-V NOTES: frame created by Jena based on ectb2. Comparison with 'fill', 'pack'. Member of VNcls spray-9.7-2. (from slather.01-v)
